review: Product is as it's described.  Sets up effortlessly and works perfectly!!  Very happy
author: lowell beglinger

review: Awesome product for the price. Provides excellent audio/video resolution on all the plasma and/or LCD screens we have. Very small and transportable--I move it around from TV to TV in the house and plan to take it with me when I visit family members. Never any performance lags in video playback. It's a fun entertainment "tool" and fun to experiment with.The only negative comment is that there is  not a lot of documentation on how to install other apps on the TV stick. I've installed a few--some work and some don't. Not sure what that's the case, but as I said, documentation is somewhat lacking.I received this as a gift, but would definitely recommend buying one to provide additional entertainment capabilities and a very low price point.
author: Amazon Customer

review: The fire stick is awesome! It turns my regular TV into a smart tv.

review: So convenient and easy to use - especially since I am a Prime member.
